name: 4WD Mountain Offroad Rush
description:
Physics based 4x4 Mountain Offroad hill climb racing game!

4WD Mountain Offroad Rush is one of the most exciting off-road games. Enjoy some four wheel fun in this side scrolling race game. You control a monster jeep with large tires for extra grip, your car has great suspension so try some jumps!

Feel the power, dynamic terrain, real time vehicle physics and outstanding music!

Features:

- 2.5D camera gives the perfect view!
- Randomly generated track!
- Very easy controls
- Outstanding 4x4 offroad vehicle physics!
